data.title: Anime Superhero Forum
data.meta_description: Anime Superhero Forum dedicated to discussing animation news, cartoons, ps4, xbox and other entertainment. Join others in discussing various shows and movies.
data.text:
The Anime Forum

toonzone no minasan, irasshai! Leave your shoes at the door, pour yourself some tea, and get ready to talk anime and manga. Explore with us the amazing horizons beyond the Toonami and Adult Swim blocks and across the ocean.

The Toonzone - General Animation Discussion

Discuss the latest in the animation industry here, including home video releases, movies, television shows, creators, and everything else in-between. This board is home to any animation discussion that does not have its own forum (including cartoons on Comedy Central, Discovery, Fox, MTV, Teletoon, or non-Disney animated movies, and any other programming blocks, networks, animation studios, etc).

The Cartoon Network Forum

The home for all Cartoon Network original animated programming discussions. From Dexter's Lab and Johnny Bravo, to "OK K.O.! Let's Be Heroes" and "Craig of the Creek", this is the forum for discussing all of your favorite "Cartoon Cartoons"!

The Adult Swim/Toonami Forum

This is the Adult Swim/Toonami board, for discussion of Cartoon Network's Adult Swim and the 2012 revival of Toonami. You should have clicked the link by now. Official Adult Swim HQ and The X-Bridge Discussion Forum.

The Nicktoons Forum

They're not just cartoons... they're Nicktoons! From Doug, Rugrats and Ren & Stimpy to SpongeBob, Fairly OddParents and Avatar to Penguins of Madagascar, Legend of Korra and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - this is the place to discuss all of Nickelodeon's animated series.

Disney/Pixar Forum

The Disney/Pixar Forum is the home for all things animated created by The Walt Disney Company and Pixar Animation Studios...from the classic films and shorts through current and future releases of the companies.

Streamtopia - Online Animation Discussion

The digital streaming age is upon us! From Netflix, Hulu, Amazon, YouTube, and beyond, this board is home to discussion for any original animated program premiering online that doesn't have its own forum!

Back To The Inkwell - Classic Cartoons Discussion

Discuss the age of animation that started it all! From the early black and white cartoons up until the rise of television - this is the era of classic theatrical shorts! From Popeye to Tom & Jerry, from Betty Boop to Mr. Magoo, from Max Fleischer to Chuck Jones, it's all here!

Saturday Morning Forever!

All Hail Saturday Morning Cartoons! Relive the magic of the antenna TV cartoons of yesteryear, from the dawn of Saturday Morning cartoons on the original Big 3 networks, to their evolution with Fox Kids and Kids WB, to the twilight days of the Saturday Mornings with Toonzai and Vortexx, it's all here! This board is home to any "over the air" classic children's cartoon that doesn't have it's own forum

The Warner Bros. Club/Boomerang Forum

Founded in 1994, The WBC is dedicated to Warner Bros. Animation, from the "Silver Age" of the 90's (and shows like Tiny Toon Adventures, Animaniacs, Pinky & the Brain, Freakazoid, Histeria) to the current wave of Warner Bros. properties (from Thundercats to The Lego Movie). Also includes discussion of the Boomerang line of contemporary cartoons that are now more affiliated with Warner Bros. Animation (from "Be Cool, Scooby Doo!" to "Wacky Races", etc).

The Entertainment Board

Online since 1998, this lively forum is devoted to the discussion of live-action entertainment! Engage in conversations about movies, television, home video releases, sports, Hollywood news, and other related topics. Chat about the latest and greatest in entertainment right here!

Comic Book Culture

Iconic superheroes or dastardly villians, stunning stories or amazing art, old comic books or upcoming ones, online comics or classic strips, characters or the creative teams - everything - this is the hangout to talk about all things related to comics!

The Musiquarium

The Musiquarium welcomes all music lovers! Share your thoughts on the latest artists, bands, groups, concerts, lyrics and musical instruments. Do you create your own music? Share it with the community!

The Voice Actors Appreciation Society

Serves to promote, encourage and cultivate an interest in and appreciation for and bring recognition to the work of professional voice actors in all broadcast media.

Cafe toonzone

Kick back, relax, sip a cappuccino, crack open a good book, and get to know your fellow toonzone members. Chat about what's going on in the world, talk about the latest in electronics (such as tablets, smartphones, and so forth), tell us about your hobbies and collectibles - toys, card games (Magic the Gathering, etc.), discuss your favorite novels, your favorite foods, and so much more! New members: stop by to introduce yourself!
